Oh the wonders of a camera phone

Similar posts Apr 12

Quick shoutout to my boy Phill. He's one of the coolest cats around HPC and I get to call him a friend of mine.

Anyway, he used his camera phone skills last night to snap a picture, and I thought it was pretty tight.

Check out his blog and go shake his hand next time you see him!
